name: Hero Tap: The Finger of Justice
name_original: Hero Tap: The Finger of Justice
description:
Ever dream of being a superhero? In this epic "Endless Earner" you'll need to tap your way to Fame and glory! Become a Legend and surround yourself with powerful Allies to take down the villainous scum!

Tap to gain Fame! Tap to gain Allies! Tap to purchase upgrades! Tap to defeat your Nemesis! It’s all about tapping, so bring the Finger of Justice down on the super villains, and start gaining Fame today!
